thread.title: John Dobbs
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by John Dobbs

author: John Dobbs
title: John Dobbs
text: We knew what we were shopping for and kinda what the price it was gonna be. So with that seeing the sale price for of our pieces come up on the screen and then seeing the salesperson change the price too a higher price wasn't right. His reason was to justify a discount he says he already gave us. But I have to say a sale price is a sale price why change the price?
